name: Formula: Fake Fly Bait
desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fake Fly Bait.

customize.name: Nantuck
customize.desc: A senior fisherman in the Mondstadt Fishing Association and a soon-to-be famous sea-life author. He guarantees that his story about a heroic fisherman pursuing a giant black whale will be a literary success once published.

customize.name: Fake Fly Bait
customize.desc:
Mimetic fly bait made from vibrantly-colored materials. It has no scent, and is specialized to attract large fish with sharp vision. It is often well-suited to more advanced angling techniques. The fishing associations of various regions regard the skilled use of such bait as one of the conditions for its members' advancement in rank.

Suitable for catching Koi, Pufferfish, and Rays.

customize.name: Sakura Bloom
customize.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

customize.name: Horsetail
customize.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper â€” like an aristocrat among the paupers.

customize.name: Formula: Redrot Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Redrot Bait.

customize.name: Formula: False Worm Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making False Worm Bait.
